faq_main_description: Find answers to your common questions here.
faq_category_account_management_desc: Guidance on registration, login, and account settings.
faq_account_q1: How do I create a new account?
faq_account_a1: To create an account, click on the 'Register' button at the top of the page and fill in the required information.
faq_account_q2: What should I do if I forget my password?
faq_account_a2: On the login page, click 'Forgot password?' and follow the reset instructions.
faq_account_q3: How do I update my profile information?
faq_account_a3: After logging in, navigate to your dashboard where you can edit your profile details.
faq_account_a4: Your username cannot be changed after registration, but you can update other profile information.
faq_category_deposits_withdrawals_desc: Questions related to managing your account balance.
faq_deposits_q1: How do I deposit funds into my account?
faq_deposits_a1: To deposit, go to the 'Deposit' section in your user panel and select your preferred deposit method (e.g., cryptocurrency).
faq_deposits_q2: What are the minimum and maximum deposit amounts?
faq_deposits_a2: The minimum deposit amount is {minAmount} USDT, and the maximum is {maxAmount} USDT.
faq_deposits_q3: How long does it take for my deposit to be confirmed?
faq_deposits_a3: Cryptocurrency deposits are usually confirmed after 3 network confirmations, which can take from a few minutes to an hour.
faq_deposits_q4: How can I withdraw from my account?
faq_deposits_a4: To withdraw, go to the 'Withdraw' section in your user panel, enter the amount and your wallet address.
faq_deposits_q5: What are the minimum and maximum withdrawal amounts?
faq_deposits_a5: The minimum withdrawal amount is {minWithdraw} USDT, and the maximum is {maxWithdraw} USDT.
faq_category_playing_games_desc: How to play and submit your predictions.
faq_games_q1: How do I participate in a Toto game?
faq_games_a1: To participate, go to the 'Active Games' section, click the 'Participate' button for your desired game, and submit your predictions.
faq_games_q2: What is the cost per prediction form?
faq_games_a2: The base cost per prediction combination is {baseCost} USDT. Selecting more than one outcome per match will increase the form cost.
faq_games_q3: Can I change my predictions after submitting?
faq_games_a3: No, once a form is submitted and paid for, predictions cannot be changed.
faq_games_q4: How can I see past game results?
faq_games_a4: Navigate to the 'Expired Games' section. There you can view results and details of past games, and even download the Excel file.
faq_games_q5: What happens if a game is cancelled?
faq_games_a5: If a game is cancelled, your prediction amount will be refunded to your account balance.
faq_category_prizes_rewards_desc: Information about prizes and how to receive them.
faq_prizes_a1: Prizes are distributed based on the number of correct predictions and the ranking of winners (1st, 2nd, 3rd place). Full details are available on each game's page.
faq_prizes_q2: How can I claim my prize?
faq_prizes_a2: Upon announcement of results and winner determination, prizes are automatically added to your account balance.
faq_prizes_q3: Is there a commission deducted from prizes?
faq_prizes_a3: The platform deducts a small commission from the total prize pool to cover operational costs. These details are specified in each game.
faq_category_technical_support_desc: For any technical issues or other inquiries.
faq_support_a1: You can contact us via the 'Contact Us' section or by submitting a new ticket in your user panel. You can also reach us by phone or email.
faq_support_q2: How long does it take to get a response to my ticket?
faq_support_a2: We strive to respond to all tickets as quickly as possible (usually within 24-48 business hours).
faq_support_a3: First, check your internet connection. Update your browser or clear its cache. If the issue persists, contact support.
contact_us_description: If you cannot find an answer to your question in our FAQ, you can always contact us. We will answer you shortly!
always_happy_to_help: We are always happy to help!
best_way_for_faster_answer: Best way to get answer faster!
terms_section_introduction_p1: Welcome to Toto Game Platform. These Terms and Conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of our website and services. By accessing or using our platform, you signify your agreement to abide by these Terms and Conditions.
terms_section_introduction_p2: Please read this document carefully. If you disagree with any part of the terms, then you may not access the Service. These Terms apply to all visitors, users, and others who access or use the Service.
terms_section_account_p1: When you create an account with us, you guarantee that you are above the age of 18, and that the information you provide us is accurate, complete, and current at all times.
terms_section_account_p2: You are responsible for safeguarding the password that you use to access the Service and for any activities or actions under your password, whether your password is with our Service or a third-party service.
terms_section_account_p3: You agree not to disclose your password to any third party. You must notify us immediately upon becoming aware of any breach of security or unauthorized use of your account. We cannot and will not be liable for any loss or damage arising from your failure to comply with this obligation.
terms_section_conduct_p1: You agree to use our platform only for lawful purposes and in a way that does not infringe the rights of, restrict, or inhibit anyone else's use and enjoyment of the platform. Prohibited behavior includes harassing or causing distress or inconvenience to any person, transmitting obscene or offensive content, or disrupting the normal flow of dialogue within our platform.
terms_section_conduct_p2: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend access to our Service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms.
terms_section_disclaimer_p1: Our Service is provided on an 'AS IS' and 'AS AVAILABLE' basis. We make no representations or warranties of any kind, express or implied, as to the operation of our Service, or the information, content, or materials included therein.
terms_section_disclaimer_p2: We do not warrant that the Service will be uninterrupted, secure, error-free, or available at any particular time or location. You expressly agree that your use of the Service is at your sole risk.
terms_section_changes_p1: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material, we will try to provide at least 30 days' notice prior to any new terms taking effect. By continuing to access or use our Service after those revisions become effective, you agree to be bound by the revised terms.
terms_section_contact_p1: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us.
